patthana15.38:1.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.38:2.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.38:3.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
